response.overview: Avs comes to Ooha's house to discuss about her sister's marriage with her family members.Avs and Ooha's father goes to marriage bureau in order to select husbands for Kovai Sarala and Kinnera. In the end they select Ali and Tanikella Bharani.Ali and Tanikella Bharani comes to Ooha's home. By knowing their professions Ooha gets angry and argues with her father.Uha's father and Avs finds Rajendra Prasad who was a auto driver and tries to fix his marriage with Ooha.Later she gets to know that her husband (Rajendra Prasad) was a auto driver and slaps him.Rajendra Prasad comes to his home with his wife Ooha and introduce his family members to her but in the mean while Kovai Sarala tries to attempt suicide by drinking Ali comes and saves her.The whole story revolves around the three families how they get settled? And teaches a lesson to their husbands.
response.title: Family 1996
